00046 #ifndef _xenomai_version_h
00047 #define _xenomai_version_h
00048 
00049 /*
00050  * Xenomai version code is an hexadecimal value
00051  * formatted as follows:
00052  *
00053  * code = 00vvrrsi, where:
00054  * - "vv" is the major version number,
00055  * - "rr" is the minor release number,
00056  * - "si" is the snapshot iteration count.
00057  *   0xff stands for a stable release, lower values denote
00058  *   intermediate snapshots taken while working on the current
00059  *   release.
00060  */
00061 
00062 #define XENO_VERSION_CODE   0x00020000
00063 
00064 #endif /* _xenomai_version_h */
